title: Gulu Military Hospital
text:
Gulu Military Hospital is a hospital in <a href="Gulu">Gulu</a>, in the <a href="Northern%20Region%2C%20Uganda">Northern Region</a> of Uganda.
Location.
It is located in the city of <a href="Gulu">Gulu</a>, in <a href="Gulu%20District">Gulu District</a>, in the <a href="Acholi%20sub-region">Acholi sub-region</a>, in Northern Uganda, on the campus of the headquarters of the 4th Division of the <a href="Uganda%20People%27s%20Defence%20Force">Uganda People's Defence Force</a> (UPDF), about northwest of <a href="Gulu%20Regional%20Referral%20Hospital">Gulu Regional Referral Hospital</a>. The hospital caters to UPDF personnel and their families.
